summary: This is an email exchange between an FBI Special Agent and a Public Affairs Specialist regarding a news article about Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys requesting a delay to unseal court documents. The email forwards a link to a Hill article on the topic.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the news article referenced in the email, whose attorneys are requesting a delay to unseal court documents.

events.title: Maxwell Attorneys Request Delay to Unseal Documents
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys ask for a delay to unseal court documents, as reported in a news article.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 11, 2020, discussing a news article about Ghislaine Maxwell's legal case.
The email is between an FBI Special Agent in the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit and a Public Affairs Specialist.
The referenced article from The Hill reports that Maxwell's attorneys requested a delay in unsealing court documents.
